parallel.distributed

Class PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk

  • public class PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk
extends java.lang.Object
    class implements a worker process, that is capable of accepting (through network sockets) arrays of TaskObjects and executes them using a parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutor. The process connects on a server (hosting the parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv process) on the dedicated port for worker connections (default 7890) and starts listening in for parallel.distributed.TaskObjectsExecutionRequest requests, which it then processes and returns the results wrapped in a parallel.distributed.TaskObjectsExecutionResults object via the connecting socket to the server.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk()
      public no-arg constructor will assume host is localhost, workers' port is 7890, and the associated PDBatchTaskExecutor will have 10 threads.
      PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk(int numthreads, java.lang.String host, int port)
      constructor provides values for the numthreads, host/port parameters for this worker.
